5136.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|130|42$جَآءُو|came|71|93|3575$مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ|after them|116|138|2256$يَقُولُونَ|they say,|88|110|753$رَبَّنَا|`Our Lord,|89|111|1167$ٱغْفِرْ|forgive|68|90|3353$لَنَا|us|42|53|338$وَلِإِخْوَٲنِنَا|and our brothers|130|139|16793$ٱلَّذِينَ|who|70|87|20$سَبَقُونَا|preceded us|101|118|15683$بِٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ|in faith,|94|111|1015$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|121|25$تَجْعَلْ|put|74|91|10299$فِى|in|48|57|89$قُلُوبِنَا|our hearts|88|102|16794$غِلاًّ|any rancor|91|120|16795$لِّلَّذِينَ|towards those who|147|176|750$ءَامَنُواْ|believed.|82|111|84$رَبَّنَآ|Our Lord,|81|110|1167$إِنَّكَ|indeed You|93|107|340$رَءُوفٌ|(are) Full of Kindness,|165|360|1819$رَّحِيمٌ|Most Merciful.`|121|316|1294$

5137.verse: ۞ أَلَمْ|Do not|89|109|348$تَرَ|you see|72|113|2301$إِلَى|[to]|53|94|118$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|130|20$نَافَقُواْ|were hypocrites,|131|172|3477$يَقُولُونَ|saying|88|108|753$لِإِخْوَٲنِهِمُ|to their brothers,|134|142|16796$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|106|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieved,|97|114|59$مِنْ|among|63|80|53$أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ|the People of the Scripture,|205|222|989$لَئِنْ|`If|52|60|4795$أُخْرِجْتُمْ|you are expelled,|133|140|16797$لَنَخْرُجَنَّ|surely we will leave|148|162|16798$مَعَكُمْ|with you,|82|96|121$وَلَا|and not|71|85|25$نُطِيعُ|we will obey|101|115|16799$فِيكُمْ|concerning you|121|128|1343$أَحَدًا|anyone,|73|86|4849$أَبَدًا|ever;|55|82|4093$وَإِن|and if|58|85|213$قُوتِلْتُمْ|you are fought,|123|150|16800$لَنَنصُرَنَّكُمْ|certainly we will help you.`|200|227|16801$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|94|167$يَشْهَدُ|bears witness|111|198|4656$إِنَّهُمْ|that they|83|257|106$لَكَـٰذِبُونَ|(are) surely liars.|133|220|5518$

5138.verse: لَئِنْ|If|52|60|4795$أُخْرِجُواْ|they are expelled,|139|155|12108$لَا|not|42|58|30$يَخْرُجُونَ|they will leave|115|131|16338$مَعَهُمْ|with them,|91|107|876$وَلَئِن|and if|66|82|1309$قُوتِلُواْ|they are fought|124|132|16802$لَا|not|42|48|30$يَنصُرُونَهُمْ|they will help them.|150|162|15421$وَلَئِن|And if|66|78|1309$نَّصَرُوهُمْ|they help them,|125|137|16803$لَيُوَلُّنَّ|certainly they will turn|169|181|16804$ٱلْأَدْبَـٰرَ|(their) backs;|111|117|3169$ثُمَّ|then|50|158|293$لَا|not|42|259|30$يُنصَرُونَ|they will be helped.|149|258|477$

5139.verse: لَأَنتُمْ|Certainly you(r)|124|133|16805$أَشَدُّ رَهْبَةً|fear is more intense|151|169|16806$فِى|in|48|66|89$صُدُورِهِم|their breasts|113|131|6397$مِّنَ|than|50|68|156$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|Allahâ€™s.|66|84|606$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|73|28$بِأَنَّهُمْ|(is) because they|137|195|607$قَوْمٌ|(are) a people|114|230|4788$لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ|(who do) not understand.|191|249|16807$

5140.verse: لَا يُقَـٰتِلُونَكُمْ|They will not fight you|169|177|16808$جَمِيعًا|all|78|94|300$إِلَّا|except|65|81|86$فِى|in|48|64|89$قُرًى|towns|65|81|14257$مُّحَصَّنَةٍ|fortified|97|113|16809$أَوْ|or|41|57|154$مِن|from|50|58|53$وَرَآءِ|behind|70|82|14128$جُدُرِۭ‌ۚ|walls.|64|89|16810$بَأْسُهُم|Their violence|112|137|16811$بَيْنَهُمْ|among themselves|142|167|1056$شَدِيدٌ‌ۚ|(is) severe.|96|121|2613$تَحْسَبُهُمْ|You think they|117|129|16812$جَمِيعًا|(are) united,|104|111|300$وَقُلُوبُهُمْ|but their hearts|124|138|12319$شَتَّىٰ‌ۚ|(are) divided.|109|123|11463$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|78|28$بِأَنَّهُمْ|(is) because they|137|151|607$قَوْمٌ|(are) a people,|119|126|4788$لَّا|not|42|306|30$يَعْقِلُونَ|they reason.|104|368|1435$

5141.verse: كَمَثَلِ|Like (the) example|142|152|137$ٱلَّذِينَ|(of) those|87|107|20$مِن قَبْلِهِمْ|before them|107|127|1094$قَرِيبًا‌ۖ|shortly,|70|90|7604$ذَاقُواْ|they tasted|98|118|6155$وَبَالَ|(the) evil result|123|133|5255$أَمْرِهِمْ|(of) their affair,|124|164|10689$وَلَهُمْ|and for them|105|186|71$عَذَابٌ|(is) a punishment|135|216|72$أَلِيمٌ|painful.|68|108|93$

5136.verse: And [there is a share for] those who came after them, saying, "Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith and put not in our hearts [any] resentment toward those who have believed. Our Lord, indeed You are Kind and Merciful."

5137.verse: Have you not considered those who practice hypocrisy, saying to their brothers who have disbelieved among the People of the Scripture, "If you are expelled, we will surely leave with you, and we will not obey, in regard to you, anyone - ever; and if you are fought, we will surely aid you." But Allah testifies that they are liars.

5138.verse: If they are expelled, they will not leave with them, and if they are fought, they will not aid them. And [even] if they should aid them, they will surely turn their backs; then [thereafter] they will not be aided.

5139.verse: You [believers] are more fearful within their breasts than Allah. That is because they are a people who do not understand.

5140.verse: They will not fight you all except within fortified cities or from behind walls. Their violence among themselves is severe. You think they are together, but their hearts are diverse. That is because they are a people who do not reason.

5141.verse: [Theirs is] like the example of those shortly before them: they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment.

5142.verse: [The hypocrites are] like the example of Satan when he says to man, "Disbelieve." But when he disbelieves, he says, "Indeed, I am disassociated from you. Indeed, I fear Allah, Lord of the worlds."
